bibl.title: Philo and the Clubs and Associations of Alexandria.
bibl.note: PHILO, In Flaccum 136, etc. - Central aspects of the associations. - Philo's comparison of the Jewish gatherings and feasts with those of the clubs and associations. - The payment of contributions: De ebrietate 20-26. - Summary and conclusions.

bibl.title: Voluntary Associations in the Graeco-Roman World

bibl.seg: SELAND Torrey, Philo and the Clubs and Associations of Alexandria.
John S. KLOPPENBORG and Stephen G. WILSON (Edd.), Voluntary Associations in the Graeco-Roman World (London - New York, 1996) pp. 110-127.

PHILO, In Flaccum 136, etc. - Central aspects of the associations. - Philo's comparison of the Jewish gatherings and feasts with those of the clubs and associations. - The payment of contributions: De ebrietate 20-26. - Summary and conclusions.
